testCases.query: SELECT customers.name, orders.order_date FROM customers JOIN main.orders ON customers.id = main.orders.customer_id WHERE main.orders.total_amount > 1000;
SELECT suppliers.supplier_name, products.product_name FROM suppliers JOIN main.products ON suppliers.supplier_id = main.products.supplier_id WHERE suppliers.country = 'USA';

testCases.name: separate namespace join query
testCases.query: SELECT db.employees.name, pb.departments.department_name FROM db.employees JOIN pb.departments ON db.employees.department_id = pb.departments.id WHERE db.employees.salary > 50000;

testCases.name: nested query
testCases.query:
SELECT
  users.id,
  users.username,
  orders.order_number,
  products.product_name
FROM
  users
  JOIN orders ON users.id = orders.user_id
  JOIN (
    SELECT
      user_id,
      product_name
    FROM
      order_details
      JOIN main.products ON order_details.product_id = main.products.id
    WHERE
      order_details.quantity > 5
  ) AS nested_table ON users.id = nested_table.user_id
WHERE
  users.status = 'active';

testCases.name: nested query with multiple namespaces and tables
testCases.query:
SELECT
  staff.id,
  staff.full_name,
  divisions.division_name,
  projects.project_title
FROM
  corp.staff
  JOIN company.divisions ON staff.division_id = divisions.id
  LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT
      employee_id,
      project_title
    FROM
      corp.employee_projects
      JOIN company.projects ON employee_projects.project_id = projects.id
    WHERE
      projects.status = 'active'
  ) AS active_projects ON staff.id = active_projects.employee_id
WHERE
  staff.salary > 60000;
